charges.charge_description: Did knowingly possess with intent to distribute approximately 43 kilos of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(D). Date of Offense: July 27, 1997. Penalty: (Each Count) Not more than 5 years imprisonment and a fine of up to $250,000 and at least 2 years SRT, and a $100 special assessment. (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: 56 months BOP, 3 years Supervised Release Term, $250.00 fine, $100.00 special assessment (1s)

charges.charge_description: Did knowingly possess with intent to distribute approximately forty-three (43) kilograms of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1) and 21:841(b)(1)(D). Date of Offense: July 27, 1997. Penalty: Not more than 5 years imprisonment, a fine of up to $250,000.00, at least 2 years SRT and a $100 Special Assessment. (1)

Did knowingly possess with intent to distribute approximately 4 kilos of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(D). Date of Offense: May 18, 1997. Penalty: (Each County) Not more than 5 years imprisonment and a fine of up to $250,000, and at least 2 years SRT, and a $100 special assessment. (2s)

Knowingly, intentionally and unlawfully possess with intent to distribute a controlled substance in Schedule I of the controlled substances Act of 1970, t wit: 127 lbs of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1). [2:97-m-196]
